Gary.Wirt-Emerson Visual and Performing Arts:
Wirt-Emerson Visual and Performing Arts High Ability Academy, is a currently operating, seven-year (6-12) middle/high school for the visual and performing arts in the Gary Community School Corporation in Gary, Indiana. For reference to the historic closed facility that originally housed Emerson VPA, and previously Emerson High School, see Emerson High School (Gary).


== History ==
Emerson High School closed in 1981 due to underpopulation.
